subject: Move favicons to public/ to fix Vercel build error
body:
Vercel expects a "public" output directory for non-framework projects.
The no-op build command (true) doesn't create one, causing the build
to fail with "No Output Directory named public found". Moving favicons
into public/ ensures the directory exists and static files are served.

https://claude.ai/code/session_018GdxVNVycPS8x1KTytw3hi
title: Move favicons to public/ to fix Vercel build error
